mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( email, password, nickname ) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, email AS email, password AS password, nickname AS nickname FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.email AS email, u.password AS password, u.nickname AS nickname FROM user u JOIN refresh_tokens rt ON u.id = rt.user_id WHERE rt.token_id = #{tokenId}
